title: Implement Pass 2: Enhanced OS Detection (registry)
close_reason: Pass 2 Enhanced OS Detection fully implemented. Created python/utils/registry_reader.py for offline Windows Registry reading (supports hivex library and PowerShell methods). Rewrote python/core/os_detector.py with multi-method detection: registry-based (HIGH confidence), pattern-based (MEDIUM/LOW). Created python/inspection/pass2_os.py with EnhancedOSDetector class. Features: Reads HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion from offline drives, extracts ProductName, DisplayVersion, CurrentBuild, EditionID, InstallDate. Includes additional Windows analysis: user profiles, installed features, program counts. Works from both Windows native and WSL environments. JSON report format compatible with inspection workflow.

title: Create frontend InspectionWizard and decision components
close_reason: Frontend InspectionWizard implemented with 5 React components (InspectionWizard, HealthReport, OSDetectionReport, DecisionPanel, DuplicateViewer), 3 API routes (inspections, reports, decisions), DatabaseService inspection methods, PythonBridge integration, and Inspections tab in App.tsx.

title: Add inspection tables to database schema
close_reason: Added 6 new tables (inspection_sessions, inspection_passes, inspection_decisions, file_hashes, duplicate_groups, duplicate_members) with 11 new indexes and 15 query methods for inspection workflow

title: Implement Pass 3: Metadata Capture with duplicate detection
close_reason: Pass 3 Metadata Capture fully implemented. Created python/utils/hash_utils.py with quick hash and SHA-256 utilities. Created python/inspection/pass3_metadata.py with MetadataCapture class: full file enumeration with progress, quick hash computation for duplicate detection, optional SHA-256 verification, cross-scan duplicate detection, database integration. JSON report with file stats, extension breakdown, size distribution, and duplicate summary.

title: Implement Pass 4: Interactive Review and report generation
close_reason: Implemented Pass 4: Interactive Review with decision points for duplicate handling, OS preservation, and file filtering. Added Claude-friendly markdown report generator to output/reports/.

title: Implement Pass 1: Drive Health Inspector (chkdsk)
close_reason: Pass 1 Drive Health Inspector fully implemented and tested. Created python/inspection/pass1_health.py with DriveHealthInspector class and python/utils/chkdsk_wrapper.py. Features: chkdsk /scan execution via PowerShell (works from Windows native and WSL), SMART data retrieval via Get-PhysicalDisk and Get-StorageReliabilityCounter, health scoring with recommendations, JSON report generation for Claude analysis, database integration for storing pass results.
